entry.title: Saturday night: Snow at times heavy. Low minus 17.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy ending near midnight then clearing. Local blowing snow late this evening and overnight. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming northwest 20 gusting to 40 then increasing to 40 gusting to 70 this evening. Low minus 17. Wind chill minus 7 this evening and minus 26 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Saturday 1 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Sunny. High minus 5.
entry.summary: Sunny. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. High minus 5. Wind chill minus 29 in the morning and minus 12 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 5 or moderate. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Saturday 1 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Increasing cloudiness. Low minus 14.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Increasing cloudiness near midnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 14. Wind chill minus 20 in the evening. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Saturday 1 April 2023
